The gospel-call in metre compiled by W.V. ; whereunto is added twenty five considerations of the pains prepared for sin after this life, with a sermon preached on Acts VII. 60. W. V.
[6], 126, [2] p.
Printed for Richard Butler ..., London : 1688.
"Twenty five considerations of the pains prepared for sin after this life ..." has special t.p. and continuous paging. Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
